name: The Temptations Trivia Game | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following members was an original member (and as of 2006, the only original member with the group)?
questions.explanation:
Otis Williams.

	Otis was born in Texas in 1939.  He is the founding member of the group, as well as the leader and businessman for the group.

questions.text: This member was a Marine and served in Vietnam. Which member am I talking about?
questions.explanation:
C.G. Cameron

	C.G. was a member of the group The Spinners before he joined the Temptations in 2003.

questions.text: In 2006, who was the bass singer for the group?
questions.explanation:
Joe Herndon.

	Joe Herndon was born January 5, 1949 in Washington, DC. He joined the Temptations in 2003.

questions.text: Which of the following joined the Temptations in 1983?
questions.explanation:
Ron Tyson.

	Ron Tyson was born February 8, 1948 in Philadelphia, PA. Tyson is the one who is in charge of coordinationg the outfits that the Temptations wear for each concert they do.

questions.text: This member of the Temptations spent eight years in the Air Force before joining the group. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Terry Weeks.

	Terry Weeks grew up in Alabama.

questions.text: The song is "Get Ready" and the lyrics say "I"m gonna try to make you ____________ me too." What word goes in the blank?
questions.explanation:
love.

	"Get Ready" is the title song of their album "Get Ready."

questions.text: The song is "Just My Imagination". What is the very first word of the song?
questions.explanation:
Each.

	"Just My Imagination" can be found on many of the CDs that the group has out. It is one of their biggest songs. One particular album that this song is on is "At Their Very Best."

questions.text: The song is "Treat Her Like a Lady". According to the song, what isn't dead?
questions.explanation:
chivalry.

	The Temptations are very chivalrous men, which may account for the fact that after all these years, women of all ages still love them.

questions.text: The song is "I Wish It Would Rain". What is the reasoning for wishing it would rain?
questions.correct: My girl has found another and gone away
options: My girl is really a man
My girl is moving to Detroit
I still haven't found a girl I love
questions.explanation:
My girl has found another and gone away.

	The Temptations' original name when the group was formed in 1960 was "the Elgins". (from wikipedia.com)

questions.text: The song is "My Girl." When it's cold outside, I got the month of _____." What month goes in the blank?
questions.explanation:
May.

	"My Girl" was written by Smokey Robinson and Ronald White of the Miracles, for the Temptations. Today it is the Temptations' signature song.
